sentences.english: Regenerative composite PN codes are appropriate for deep space ranging.
sentences.chinese: 再生複合僞碼非常適合於深空測距。

sentences.english: This composite image shows a small region of the ChandraDeep Field North.
sentences.chinese: 這幅組合圖像顯示了錢德拉塞卡北深空區的一小部分。

sentences.english: How do you power a spacecraft in deep space?
sentences.chinese: 進入深空，我們如何驅動太空船？

sentences.english: China to have deep space monitoring network in 2016.
sentences.chinese: 我國深空測控網建設步伐加快2016年將全面建成。

sentences.english: The warnings from DSCOVR will be for the whole planet.
sentences.chinese: 來自“深空氣候觀測臺”的警報將會針對整個地球。

sentences.english: The DSN is also used by radio astronomers.
sentences.chinese: 深空網也被射電天文學家使用。

sentences.english: Radar has already became one of the most important equipments for deep-space detection.
sentences.chinese: 雷達已成爲深空探測的重要設備。

sentences.english: Mellow sweetness, beauty of field of deep space unseen.
sentences.chinese: 清醇甘甜之美，星月深空之幽。

sentences.english: Secondly, the safing design of deep space explorer design is presented.
sentences.chinese: 其次，對深空探測器星務管理系統安全模式進行設計。

definition: US National Aeronautics and Space Administration/NASA
moon landing/to land on the moon
